definitions.definition: A monarch ; the ruler of a country .
One who is not a subject to a ruler or nation.
A gold coin of the United Kingdom, with a nominal value of one pound sterling but in practice used as a bullion coin.
A former Australian gold coin, minted from 1855–1931, of one pound value.
A very large champagne bottle with the capacity of about 25 liters , equivalent to 33 + ⁄ 3 standard bottles.
Any butterfly of the tribe Nymphalini , or genus Basilarchia , eg., ursula , viceroy .
A large, garish ring; a sovereign ring .

main_definition: A monarch ; the ruler of a country .
secondary_definitions: One who is not a subject to a ruler or nation.
A gold coin of the United Kingdom, with a nominal value of one pound sterling but in practice used as a bullion coin.
A former Australian gold coin, minted from 1855–1931, of one pound value.
A very large champagne bottle with the capacity of about 25 liters , equivalent to 33 + ⁄ 3 standard bottles.
Any butterfly of the tribe Nymphalini , or genus Basilarchia , eg., ursula , viceroy .
( UK , slang ) A large, garish ring; a sovereign ring .
